item.title: how the humble zx spectrum handled trig
item.description: The ZX is not a calculator The ZX Spectrum played a big part in my childhood, swallowing up whole chunks of time - hours days weeks at a time - both through gaming, and painstaking programming in assembly language to create incredibly primitive games. As I got older, and became an electronics engineer, this humble little home computer from the 1980â€™s amazed me more and more as I learnt more about its inner workings.
